Equilynx.name: Equilynx
Equilynx.description:
<c=254d0c>Equilynx</c>
From Elestria, it brings the power of the Earth element with it specializing in <c=boldPink>Midrow that want to be Destroyed</c> and <c=boldPink>instant Midrow movement.</c>

BookOfTails.name: BOOK OF TAILS
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

Counting.name: COUNTING
Counting.description: At start of turn, count sheeps. Once you counted 7 sheep, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> and start counting again.

description.None: Attack for set amount = 3. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.A: Attack for set amount = 4. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.B: Attack for set amount = 5. On hit, apply 2 <c=status>BOOST</c>.

AutododgeLeftNextTurn.name: Autododge Left Next Turn
AutododgeLeftNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>AUTODODGE LEFT</c>.

Mini.name: Mini Earth Stone
Mini.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>1</c> in the same direction.

Normal.name: Earth Stone
Normal.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>2</c> in the same direction.

Big.name: Big Earth Stone
Big.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>3</c> in the same direction.

offset.description: Destroy an <c=midrow>object</c> <c=boldPink>{0}</c> spaces to the {1} of your {2}.

notOffset.description: Destroy an <c=midrow>object</c> in front of your {2}.
